channel.title: How i make npcs talk what files i edit and how i make myself admin
channel.description: i downloaded fr33sc4p3 pkz and i anit the owner i wanna b owner and make npcs say eg "owner is username" and i am going on ip 0.0.0.0 how i let others go on it??plz help!!!!btw i dont have router so i use hamachi

item.title: How i make npcs talk what files i edit and how i make myself admin
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Adminship

Go into your characters file.
Look for your name.
Double click it.
Change the player rights to 3.

Or

Go into your client file.
Hold ctrl and f.
Search for.

3 = Admin

Below change the name to your player name.

Talking Npc

Go into you npchandler file.
Hold ctrl and f.
Search for.

"Moo"

Below the.

} */

Press enter and add.

if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true) { npcs[i].getNextNPCMovement(); } if (npcs[i].npcType == NpcId) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Speech"; } }

Change the speech and the npc identification.

item.title: How i make npcs talk what files i edit and how i make myself admin
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

to make npcs talk go to NPChandler

above

} else if (npcs[i].IsDead == true) { if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].DeadApply == false && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false) {

add

else if (npcs[i].npcType == ENTERNPCIDHERE) { if (misc.random2(50) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "ENTER TEXT HERE"; } }

item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I

@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

OK To make yourself an admin you go into the character foldor. Your name should be there, double click it. Change the ‘Player rights’ to 3 and your done.
